post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
Subject: Are you available for an Oracle and CORBA Progarmmer Analyst position in Mississauga?
To: kwon96@yahoo.com
From: gbalfour@asset.ca | This is spam | Add to Address Book
Date: Mon, 20 Oct 2003 12:23:29 -0400
      




Our client needs to hire 2 PAs and 1 SrPA  immediately. If you will
have an
analysis and client server programming background working with PL/SQL  
and
Pro-C ( or C and SQL) on Oracle systems, you may be a good fit for this
rapidly growing IT shop in Mississauga.  Your communication skills must
be
very good and you must be a self-motivated, high energy individual who
can
work well within a team.

Experience with HP-UX is preferred  ( any other version of Unix is ok).
Programming experience with Visual Basic (or equivalent language) is
highly
preferred.   Knowledge of Tuxedo or MQ-Series would also be a bonus .
In
2004, the company will begin the process to move all corporate systems
to a
JAVA J2EE environment and are encouraging all staff to acquire training
in
this area.


If this position interests you, please forward your latest resume ASAP.

Than you.

Regards.

Gene Balfour
IT Recruitment Specialist since 1981
Asset Computer Personnel Ltd
E-Mail:  mailto:gbalfour@Asset.ca
(416) 777-1717 x240
post.title: an Oracle and CORBA Progarmmer Analyst position in Mississauga
